EmailTemplate.name: Email emplate for deassociation of client Contact Relationship Team
EmailTemplate.subject: The Contact has been deassociated with the Key Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Client Contact Relationship Team,
The Contact {Object.Name} has been deassociated with the Key Account {Account.Name}.
Please click on the following link to access on LinKreta, {Object.Link} Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
